channel.title: How would i find my driver
channel.description: OK my graphics driver is messed up and i want to fix it. how i find out my drivers manufacuare??

item.title: How would i find my driver
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

goto start> right click My Computer> properties>hardware tab> device manager> look for a collapsed list, there should be one yellow icon. click, and install drivers, search for it using the web. I hope that helps, i had that same prob and thats how i fixed it.

Read full topic
item.source: How would i find my driver

item.title: How would i find my driver
item.dc:creator: @KoRnRoOsTeR KoRnRoOsTeR
item.description:
@KoRnRoOsTeR wrote:

Ok i fixed for my internet driver i went to intel.com

for my grahphics driver i just did wat dark said

[quote=“darkdemun, post:1, topic:109547”]try right clicking My Computer and press Properties >> Hardware Tab >> Device Manager, then look for your graphics card under there once found open its properties and it should be in there

but i updated it instead

EDIT: graphics card should be under monitor adapters or something called that[/quote]

i still need sound card driver

Read full topic
